name: Daniel Maschmann
title: M. Sc.
cv: Daniel Maschmann is a student research assistant since January 2019 funded by the DFG Initiative of Excellence. He is responsible for establishing the link to the DFG Research Group „Epistemology of LHC“ at the Physics Department of the RWTH Aachen University. He recieved a Master in Physics at the RWTH Aachen University in 2018 and he is currently studying Literature, Linguistics and Philosophy at the RWTH.
field: Physics (M. Sc., absolved); Literary and Linguistic Studies (B.A.)
